title: Welcome to the Training Program!
message: We're excited to have you on board. Get ready to learn and grow with us. Don't forget to check your schedules!

title: Upcoming Workshop: Advanced React
message: Join us for an in-depth workshop on Advanced React concepts this Friday at 3 PM. Don't miss out!

title: Reminder: Submit Your Assignments
message: Just a friendly reminder to submit your assignments before the deadline. Late submissions will not be accepted.

title: Team Building Activity
message: We have a fun team-building activity planned for next week. Stay tuned for more details!

title: Feedback Survey
message: Please take a few minutes to fill out the feedback survey for the last training session. Your feedback helps us improve.
